title: Geyser
info: Geysers are traps that spew a vertical stream of fire when triggered with wire on the  Console version. On the  Desktop version and  Mobile version they will activate if a player (not an enemy) touches them, and will generate on worldgen without pressure plates or wires (but they can still be triggered by wires as a player-placed trap). They consume no ammunition, their output being limited only by a cooldown period of ~3.33 (3 1/3) seconds. Geyser streams extend approximately 20 tiles up or down, depending on placement. They are found naturally-placed in random areas that are deep enough to generate lava, including the Underworld and deeper Cavern areas, wired to Pressure Plates.
